metadata.name: American Terrorist
metadata.description: A war has been waged against the American people. It's a covert war, one that those in power hope will go unnoticed, but day by day, jobs, homes, pensions and civil liberties are taken away while the gap between the haves and the have-nots grows wider. With no way out, four activists become fugitives of the law and go on the offensive against corruption and injustice. They share their story with the nation using social media to inspire their followers to rise up and reclaim their country.
